Title: Broken Masquerade
Description:
I cannot remember how I arrived at this swamp, but it was great luck that I did. As I wandered, I spotted Lady Katrana Prestor entering a strange toothy cave. Now, what would a noblewoman be doing in such a ghoulish place?

Following her closely, I found a great clutch of black dragon eggs within the lair. Such evidence is clear. Katrana is Lady Onyxia! 

I beg of you, aid me in defeating this vile dragon once and for all.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Remembered Onyxia during a Radiant Echoes event.
RewardText:
Is it true? She finally rests?

Hers was an unwavering ambition. It's good that we stopped her when we did. I cannot imagine the tragedies that would have followed if she was allowed to continue her ploys and schemes.
